amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to appoint chaplains without an endorsing agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 35 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent funds from being used to appoint chaplains without an endorsing agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 173 (Roll no. 392).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 173 (Roll no. 392).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Fleming.
